name: Mold Breaker
summary: Ignores the effects of Abilities that could weaken or negate moves that the user uses.
viability: Mold Breaker is important, mostly for the fact that it negates a Pok√©mon with Magic Bounce and Levitate. This allows the user to either set up or start going for Earthquake. Excadrill is the best Mold Breaker user, as it makes Rotom-Wash from a counter to an easy kill.
